00030 /**
00031  * Class for the flexform 'group' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Group extends tx_oop_Flexform_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType       = 'group';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * 
00047      */
00048     protected $_uploadDirectory = '';
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * 
00052      */
00053     public function setUploadDirectory( $dir )
00054     {
00055         $this->_uploadDirectory = ( string )$dir;
00056     }
00057     
00058     /**
00059      * 
00060      */
00061     public function setAsFile( $allowed, $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00062     {
00063         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'file';
00064         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00065         $this->_config[ 'uploadfolder' ]  = $this->_uploadDirectory;
00066         $this->_config[ 'show_thumbs' ]  = true;
00067         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00068         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00069         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00070     }
00071     
00072     /**
00073      * 
00074      */
00075     public function setAsDb( $allowed, $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00076     {
00077         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'db';
00078         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00079         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00080         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00081         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00082     }
00083     
00084     /**
00085      * 
00086      */
00087     public function setAsFolder( $maxItems = 1, $minItems = 0 )
00088     {
00089         $this->_config[ 'internal_type' ] = 'folder';
00090         $this->_config[ 'allowed' ]       = $allowed;
00091         $this->_config[ 'maxitems' ]     = $maxItems;
00092         $this->_config[ 'minitems' ]     = $minItems;
00093         $this->_config[ 'size' ]         = ( $maxItems > 1 ) ? 5 : 1;
00094     }
00095 }
